This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Animating {font-size: 'inherit'} should be responsive to changes in the inherited font-size. 
PASS Animating {font-size: 'larger'} should be responsive to changes in the inherited font-size. 
PASS Animating {font-size: 'smaller'} should be responsive to changes in the inherited font-size. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
